Players will become participants in the Auction, where attributes of luxurious life are exhibited as lots: “Mansion in Chelsea”, “Fox Hunting” and even “Your Personal Island”.
The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible for luxurious life items by placing bets. The game involves 2 to 4 players. The game is designed for players from 7 years.
Exciting game and participation in the auction - two in one, so the game is so good!

The game kit includes:

9 cards — attributes of luxurious life;
36 cards — bets (4 sets of 9 cards with shirts of different colors);
rules of the game.

Auction:

The rules of the game "Auction". Everything is very simple and clear. Players using card bets try to redeem at the Auction cards attributes of luxurious life. Game progress:

- put the deck of attribute-cards of luxurious life face down - these are the lots;
- Give each player a set of 9 betting cards;
- turn over the card with the lot;
- players select a bet card from their deck, lay it face-up in front of them; when all bets have been placed, card bets are turned over and their face values â€‹â€‹are compared. Given the characteristics of the cards, the winner is determined who picks up the lot. The cards played are discarded;
- the game continues in the same way until the lots end;
when all 9 lots are redeemed, the auction is over and the players count points. Points are shown on luxury cards;
- the player who scored the most points wins.

Each lot has an icon that determines its belonging to a certain type: luxury item, vehicle or real estate. If a player collects cards with 3 identical badges, he gets 3 extra points.

The game has character cards that have their own characteristics. For example, a bully scares the seller and the lot goes into dumping.

This game is a small, fun auction!
The box from the game is compact, you can take the game with you when you are visiting or traveling. Character illustrations are funny.

The board game "Auction" is an exciting game that you can play with your whole family or with friends. The game will give an excellent mood, and also develops logic and teaches to develop tactical techniques.
